portrait_r.sjis: みゅーの様ト 今後ノ計画ニツイテ 打チ合ワセスル 必要ガアリマスノデ シバラク 出カケマス
portrait_r.ascii: I Must Meet Lady Murno To Discuss Our Plans From Hereon. I Will Be Away For Some Time.

portrait_r.sjis: これからの事でミューノに話があっての すまんが少し 勝手をさせてもらうぞ
portrait_r.ascii: I need to talk to Murno about our plans from hereon. My apologies. I will be off.

portrait_r.sjis: ミューノに話があるだけだ キサマには関係ない
portrait_r.ascii: I have to talk to Murno. It has nothing to dowith you.

portrait_r.sjis: ミューノ様とこれからのことを お話ししたいので すみませんが
portrait_r.ascii: I want to talk with Lady Murno about what to do from hereon I'm sorry, but

male.sjis: そっか わかったよ

female.sjis: そっか わかったよ

portrait_l.sjis: ミューノのお父さんもいるし もうすぐ村にかえるワケだし きっと色々あるんだよな
portrait_l.ascii: There's still the matter of Murno's father, and they'll be returning to their village soon. I'm sure they have a lot on thier minds

portrait_l.sjis: 仕方ない オレはオレでミューノの村へ行く 準備をすすめておこう
portrait_l.ascii: Oh well. I need to get my own things ready too.

portrait_l.sjis: そういえば、レミィはやっぱり お母さんにだまって行くつもり なのかなぁ
portrait_l.ascii: That reminds me, I wonder if Lemmy is really not going to tell his mother anything

portrait_l.sjis: ミューノのお父さんもいるし もうすぐ村にかえるワケだし きっと色々あるんだよね
portrait_l.ascii: There's still the matter of Murno's father, and they'll be returning to their village soon. I'm sure they have a lot on their minds

portrait_l.sjis: 仕方ない わたしはわたしでミューノの村へ行く 準備をすすめておこう
portrait_l.ascii: Oh well. I need to get my own things ready too.

portrait_l.sjis: そういえば、レミィはやっぱり お母さんにだまって行くつもり なのかなぁ
portrait_l.ascii: That reminds me, I wonder if Lemmy is really not going to tell his mother anything
